授業方法:
*The format and schedule may change during the semester, depending on student needs and the evolving coronavirus situation.

This seminar style class will be conducted online (‘on-demand’ via Edmodo and ‘real time’ via Zoom.) Assignments will be conducted, and lesson resources provided, on Edmodo. As such, students will need access to a computer at home. Please access the Zoom link provided on Luna and Edmodo. Look out for a message from me on Luna.

Students will engage in active learning in English: working together in pairs, groups, and as a whole class on listening and speaking activities, and individually researching, writing, and performing short presentations.

トピック.授業外学習2:
Outside of class:
- Every week you must complete homework assignments. You will research and write about textbook topics
and prepare short presentations. It is very important to complete assignments every time.
- Review each lesson, and check any new content, language or skills learned.
- Access any online material required. Some assignments may involve online research.
- You should expect to spend about 1 hour doing homework per class period.
- Do not hesitate to contact me if you need any help, I’m happy to speak to you.
